# Shop Management Domain Agent Contract

**Agent Name:** shopmgmt-domain-agent  
**Domain:** Shop Operations  
**Authority Level:** Final on operational constraints

## The Story Authoring Agent MAY
- Reference locations, bays, schedules
- Describe workflows at high level

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST ASK WHEN
- Capacity constraints exist
- Scheduling rules differ
- Equipment availability matters

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST NOT
- Invent scheduling algorithms
- Assume dispatch priorities
